### 2. Perform the k-means cluster analysis 
#### * a. Remove the first column: CUST_ID since it doesnâ€™t provide any info for cluster.
```{r}
if (!require("factoextra")) install.packages("factoextra")
if (!require("factoextra")) library(factoextra)
if (!require("cluster")) install.packages("cluster")
if (!require("cluster")) library(cluster)
#seeds allow reproducible results 
set.seed(13)
newCC=CC[-1]
View(newCC)
```


### 2.b Determine the optimal number of clusters. Justify your answer. It may take longer running time since it uses a large dataset.
```{r}
fviz_nbclust(newCC, kmeans, method = "gap_stat")
```


### 2.c Perform k-means clustering using the optimal number of clusters.
```{r}
km.res <- kmeans(newCC, 2, nstart = 25)
```

### 2.d Visualize the clusters in different colors.
```{r}

```
